participant_1.name: Luna
participant_1.personality: playful and imaginative, with a hint of melancholy due to loneliness.
participant_1.background: i'm a little girl. i'm very lonely. i have superpowers. i live in the cloud. i like to make time stop.

participant_2.name: Eli
participant_2.personality: responsible and disciplined, yet adventurous as a stunt double.
participant_2.background: i only eat kosher. i read twenty books a year. i was raised in a single parent household. i never broke a bone in my body ever in my life. i'm a stunt double as my second job.
